row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 2)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
row_desc: Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has one lip sync win.
Queen has two lip sync wins.
col_desc: Queen has two mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
